main_definition: as follows or in a manner appropriate to the situation described beforehand

meanings_and_examples.definition: In response to something previously stated or decided.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company will increase production if sales continue to grow; accordingly, they have hired more workers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Based on the information given beforehand.
meanings_and_examples.example: She studied hard for her exams and accordingly earned excellent grades.

meanings_and_examples.definition: As a result or effect of something stated earlier.
meanings_and_examples.example: It was raining heavily, so he carried an umbrella; accordingly, his clothes stayed dry.
